capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite complex. Apparently, he has a condition called maculogy which affects the size of his pupils. I'm pretty sure this information is accurate, so I'd say I'm fairly certain about it. To be honest, it's a bit concerning to think about how this might impact his daily life, but overall, I think it's good that we're aware of it now.
